roleset_name: to find or prove guilty of an offense or crime, finding guilty of a crime
roleset_name_trans: 发现或证明有罪或有罪, 发现有罪

roles.descr: Believer, person who holds a conviction/belief
roles.descr_trans: 信徒，持有信念/信仰的人
所相信的事物，信念本身

roles.descr: Attributive, what is the domain/subject matter of the conviction?
roles.descr_trans: 定语，定罪的领域/主题是什么？
